participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introspective and creative, enjoys solo activities that challenge the mind.
participant_1.background: I don't wash my clothes as often as I should. I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir. My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever. I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me. I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and family-oriented, loves adventure and has a passion for reading.
participant_2.background: I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what. I love the outdoors. I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up. My dad is very strict with his kids. My favorite book is David Copperfield.

content.text: I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me.
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
I hope your family loves you very much.
They do! What do you do for fun?
I love to learn new things and keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
That's awesome! I love to read and go outdoors.
What's your favorite book?
David Copperfield is my favorite book.
I've never read it. What's it about?
It's about a boy who grows up in the 19th century and has to overcome many challenges.
That sounds like a great book. I'll have to check it out.
I hope you enjoy it! It's a classic.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do outside?
I love to go hiking, camping, and swimming.
That sounds like so much fun! I love the outdoors.
Me too! I feel so relaxed when I'm outside.
Me too! It's so peaceful.
I wish I could spend more time outside.
Me too! We should go on a hike together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Great! I'm looking forward to it!
